item-set.name: patterns
item-set.label: Cache Patterns
item-set.help-text: If no patterns are provided, all paths are cached. Otherwise, at least one pattern should match the request path for the request to be cached.

input.name: invert
input.label: Invert
input.help-text: Invert the result of pattern matching.

item-set.name: bypassHeaders
item-set.label: Bypass Headers
item-set.help-text: If a request contains a listed header with a matching value, it will not be cached.

input.name: pattern
input.label: Pattern
input.help-text: A regular expression that matches a header value, for example: "(?i).*\\bgooglebot\\b.*"

input.name: invert
input.label: Invert
input.help-text: Invert the result of header value pattern matching.

item-set.name: bypassCookies
item-set.label: Bypass Cookies
item-set.help-text: If a request contains a listed cookie with a matching value, it will not be cached.

input.name: pattern
input.label: Pattern
input.help-text: A regular expression that matches a cookie value, for example: "(?i)nocache"

input.name: invert
input.label: Invert
input.help-text: Invert the result of cookie value pattern matching.
